description: The Livestock and Meat Trade Data Set contains monthly and annual data for imports and exports of live cattle, hogs, sheep, and goats, as well as beef and veal, pork, lamb and mutton, chicken meat, turkey meat, and eggs. The tables report physical quantities, not dollar values or unit prices. Data on beef and veal, pork, and lamb and mutton are on a carcass-weight-equivalent basis. Breakdowns by country are included.
title: Livestock and Meat International Trade Data

distribution.title: ZIP file of CSV formatted data
Web page with links to Excel files

publisher.name: Economic Research Service, Department of Agriculture
